abstracts.cdata!:
The main objectives of the project are
            to assist the Government to improve the efficiency of the
            energy sector by providing a sound legal, institutional and
            regulatory framework, fostering sound planning and pricing
            policies, attracting private sector participation to the
            power sector, and strengthening the Comision Ejecutiva
            Hidroelectrica del Rio Lempa's (CEL) efficiency and
            management.  These objectives will be achieved through: (a)
            the formulation of an energy policy document; (b)
            transferring the policy and regulatory functions from CEL to
            a regulatory body to be created; (c) reforming the
            organization of the power sector to foster private sector
            participation; (d) assistance in redesigning the structure
            of electricity rates; (e) preparing a portfolio of power
            generation projects; and (f) improving management
            capabilities within CEL.  The project will include the
            following components: (a) sector studies; (b) engineering
            and management studies; (c) acquisition of equipment and
            materials; and (d) a training program.
